retirementAnnuity: Ungakhokhela ama-27.5% emali oyitholayo noma u-R350 000, noma yikuphi okuphansi, emalini ebhanka lakho lokuthatha umhlalaphansi.
medicalCredits: Amakhredithi entela ezokwelapha: R364/inyanga kumalungu ayinhloko kanye nalabo abathembelwe kuwe.
travelAllowance: 80% walesabelomali kuyafanele ukukhokhiswa intela uma ungenalo ibhuku lokuhamba.
disabilityDeduction: Isaphulelo esingu-R1 725 kubakhokhi bentela abakhubazekile ngokomthetho.
